img_above_text:
![Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6e/Starlit_Cloud-Bidden_Antler.jpg)
To obtain the Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler, you need to defeat Kang-Jin Loong in Snowhill Path in Mirrormere in The New West.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6e/Starlit_Cloud-Bidden_Antler.jpg)
To obtain the Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler, you need to defeat Kang-Jin Loong in Snowhill Path in Mirrormere in The New West."
        - Following Text: "For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a player character confronting a large, serpentine dragon-like creature in a snowy landscape. This encounter is likely part of a quest to defeat Kang-Jin Loong in the Snowhill Path area of Mirrormere, necessary to obtain the Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler. The image serves as a visual guide for players seeking to complete this challenge.
